subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Each time Army, Navy and Air Force play, the winning team sings its alma mater after the losing team has sung its version. The Black Knights have not gotten to sing second since 2005.
snippet: Each time Army, Navy and Air Force play, the winning team sings its alma mater after the losing team has sung its version. The Black Knights have not gotten to sing second since 2005.
